Posts.Content: Hi, well done you are nearly there.  These are completely normal feelings.  Who wants to volunteer to have needles with Tax injected into them knowing that its going to make you feel aweful.  Well done for getting this far.  You just about recover and feel Ok again and its back to chemo.  Finishing that last one is a great feeling and you are not far away.  Hang on in there.xx
Posts.Title: Pre-chemo slump

Posts.Content: Hi,  I still can't believe I have breast cancer and I am post surgery, chemo and radio.  Mine was also a high grade DCIS and we are all here for you to share our experiences.  I still struggle with the why me and have down days imagining the worst so its totally normal what you are going through.  Wishing you the best as I remember the first few weeks of just being totally shell shocked and struggling to deal with the diagnosis and the wait for surgery,
Posts.Title: I feel Shellshocked.
